name: Kangaroo Kicker
instruction: Stir well and strain into an old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Add 1 jigger of Vodka, top up with Orange Juice, and garnish with a slice of Orange.

name: Knickerbocker Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Knock-out Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Gene Tunney, Heavyweight Champion of the World.
